name: Dx
label: dx
description: Length of a cubic voxel in µm, which reflects grid resolution

name: NumVoxels
label: voxels
description: Number of cubic voxels, which reflects grid resolution

name: NumParticles
label: # Particles
description: Number of **particles**

name: VFF
label: Void Vol Fraction
description: Ratio of **void space volume** over **total scaffold volume**

name: VFFIntPores
label: Void Vol Fraction of Interior Pores
tableLabel: Void volume fraction of interior pores
description: Ratio of **total interior pore volume** over **total scaffold volume**

name: AvgVoidAreaFraction
label: Void Area Fraction
description: Average **void area fraction** across a sample of 2D-slices

name: ParticlePackingFraction
label: Particle Fraction
description: Ratio of **particle volume** over **total scaffold volume**

name: NumTotalPores
label: # 3D Pores
description: Number of pores **(surface + interior)**

name: NumIntPores
label: # Interior 3D Pores
description: Number of **interior pores**

name: NumIntPoresdivParticlesSurrIntPores
label: # Int 3D-Pores / # Particles Surr Int Pores
tableLabel: Number of interior pores / Number of particles surrounding interior pores
description: Ratio of **number of interior pores** over **number of particles bounding interior pores**

name: MaxNumEquidistParticles
label: Max # Equidistant Particles
description: **Maximum number of particles** equidistant to any single peak

name: NumParticleContacts
label: # Particle Contacts
description: Number of **particle-particle contact points**

name: NumIntDoors
label: # Interior Doors
description: Number of **interior doors**

name: NumPaths
label: # Paths
description: Number of **paths** that travel from the center of the scaffold to each exit door

name: ParticleAdjacencyMatrixEigenvalue
label: Particle Adj Max Eig
description: Eigenvalue of the **particle adjacency matrix**

name: PeakAdjacencyMatrixEigenvalue
label: Peak Adj Max Eig
description: Eigenvalue of the **peak adjacency matrix**

name: PoreAdjacencyMatrixEigenvalue
label: Pore Adj Max Eig
description: Eigenvalue of the **pore adjacency matrix**

name: NumExitDoors
label: # Exterior Doors
description: Number of **doors to enter or exit** the scaffold

name: MaxNumPeaksAmongSurfacePores
label: Max # Pks of Edge Pore
tableLabel: Max number of peaks among surface pores
description: **Maximum number of peaks** contained within a single surface pore

name: LigandHotspotsVolFrac
label: Ligand Hotspots Volume Fraction
description: Ratio of **total void space volume that 'senses' ≥ 2,167,200 ligand molecules** over **total scaffold volume**

name: Volume
label: Volume (pL)
description: **Volume** of the pore

name: SA
label: Surface Area (um2 / 1000)
description: **Surface area** of the pore

name: CharacteristicLength
label: Characteristic Length (um)
description: Ratio of **volume** over **surface area** of the pore

name: LongestLength
label: Longest Length (um)
description: **Longest chord length** that spans two surface points of the pore

name: AvgInternalDiam
label: Avg Internal Diam (um)
description: **Average width** along the internal backbone of the pore

name: AspectRatio
label: Aspect Ratio
description: Ratio of **longest length** over **average internal diameter**

name: LargestEnclosedSphereDiam
label: Largest Enclosed Sphere Diameter (um)
description: **Diameter of the largest sphere** that can fit entirely within the pore

name: NumSurrParticles
label: # Surrounding Particles
description: Number of **particles** that enclose the pore

name: NumPeaks
label: # Peaks
description: Number of **peaks** contained within the pore

name: ParticleSA
label: Particle Surface Area (um^2)
description: **Surface area** of the pore's **physical boundary** formed by surrounding particles

name: OpenSA
label: Open (Non-Particle) Surface Area (um^2)
description: **Surface area** of the pore's **conceptual boundary** in the void space

name: MeanLocalThickness
label: Mean Local Thickness (um)
description: The average across **measurements of 'thickness'** computed at every point within the pore (Hildebrand T and Ruegsegger P, 1997)

name: NumParticleEdges
label: # Particle Edges
description: Number of **pore edges** formed at the intersection of the pore's physical (particle) and conceptual (non-particle) boundaries

name: NumVertices
label: # Vertices
description: Number of **pore vertices** formed at particle contact points surrounding the pore

name: ParticleSAdivOpenSA
label: Particle Surface Area / Open Surface Area
tableLabel: Particle surface area / open surface area
description: Ratio of **particle-boundary surface area** over **non-particle-boundary surface area**

name: EllipsoidAxis1Length
label: Ellipsoid Axis 1 Length (um)
description: Length of the **largest axis** of the PCA ellipsoid computed from the pore's point cloud

name: EllipsoidAxis2Length
label: Ellipsoid Axis 2 Length (um)
description: Length of the **second largest axis** of the PCA ellipsoid computed from the pore's point cloud

name: EllipsoidAxis3Length
label: Ellipsoid Axis 3 Length (um)
description: Length of the **third largest axis (Axis 1)** of the PCA ellipsoid computed from the pore's point cloud

name: EllipsoidClassification
label: Ellipsoid Classification
description: 0 = undefined shape, 1 = spherical shape, 2 = pancake-like shape, 3 = tube-like shape

name: NumHallways
label: # Hallways
description: Number of **exits through doors** of the pore

name: NumCrawlSpaces
label: # Crawl Spaces
description: Number of **exits through touching particles** surrounding the pore

name: NumConnectedPores
label: # Connected Pores
description: Number of **neighboring pores accessible through the doors** of the pore

name: NumSurroundingPores
label: # Surrounding Pores
description: Number of **neighboring pores accessible through the doors and crawl spaces** of the pore

name: NormalizedNeighbors
label: Normalized Neighbors
description: Ratio of the **number of hallways** over the **number of crawl spaces**

name: LargestDoorDiam
label: Largest Door Diameter (um)
description: Diameter of the **largest door** of the pore

name: SmallestDoorDiam
label: Smallest Door Diameter (um)
description: Diameter of the **smallest door** of the pore

name: LigandConcentration
label: Ligand Concentration (umoles / L)
description: **Effective ligand concentration** of the pore as felt by a migrating object whose diameter is 1/60th the x-axis length of the scaffold

name: AccessibleLigand
label: Accessible Ligand (umoles)
description: **Cumulative amount of ligand** on particle surfaces that bound the pore

name: IsotropyAnisotropy
label: Isotropy
description: Value between 0 and 1, where **0 indicates** that the pore is oriented **perpendicularly to the average** orientation across all pores and **1 indicates** that the pore is orientated **in the same direction as the average** pore orientation

name: xCentroid
label: x Centroid
description: (x,y,z) coordinate of the centroid of the pore

name: yCentroid
label: y Centroid
description: (x,y,z) coordinate of the centroid of the pore

name: zCentroid
label: z Centroid
description: (x,y,z) coordinate of the centroid of the pore

name: ParticleDiam
label: Particle Diameter (um)
description: **Diameter** of the particle

name: ParticleCoord
label: Particle Coordination #
description: Number of particles that are **neighboring (close or touching)** the particle

name: TouchingParticleCoord
label: Touching Particle Coord #
description: Number of particles that are in **contact with (touching)** the particle

name: ExitDoorDiam
label: Exit Door Diameter (um)
description: Diameter of the **door to enter or exit** the scaffold

name: IntDoorDiam
label: Internal Door Diameter (um)
description: Diameter of the **interior door** within the scaffold

name: CrawlSpaceWidth
label: Crawl Space Width (um)
description: Width of the **crawl space** within the scaffold

name: PathLength
label: Path Length (um)
description: **Length** of the path, which travels from the center of the scaffold to an exit door

name: TortuositybyLength
label: Tortuosity by Length
description: Ratio of **path length** over **straight-line distance between start and end points** of the path

name: TortuositybyVol
label: Tortuosity by Volume (pL)
description: Volume of the **convex hull** of all points along the path

name: NumIntPoresPath
label: # Interior 3D Pores Traversed by Path
tableLabel: Number of particles enclosing interior portion of path
description: Number of **particles enclosing the interior pores** along the path

name: NumExtPoresPath
label: # Exterior 3D Pores Traversed by Path
tableLabel: Number of particles enclosing exiting portion of path
description: Number of **particles enclosing the surface pores** along the path

name: NumParticlesEnclosingIntPath
label: # Particles Enclosing Interior Path
tableLabel: Number of interior pores traversed by path
description: Number of **interior pores** that are traversed by the path

name: NumParticlesEnclosingExitPath
label: # Particles Enclosing Exiting Path
tableLabel: Number of surface pores traversed by path
description: Number of **surface pores** that are traversed by the path

name: NumBottlenecksTotal
label: # Bottlenecks (total)
description: Number of **narrow regions** along the path (including doors)

name: AvgBottleneckDiamTotal
label: Avg Bottleneck Diameter (total) (um)
description: **Average diameter of the narrow regions** along the path

name: NumBottlenecksDoors
label: # Bottlenecks (doors)
description: Number of **doors** that are traversed along the path

name: AvgBottleneckDiamDoors
label: Avg Bottleneck Diameter (doors) (um)
description: **Average diameter of doors** along the path

name: SurfaceLigandConc
label: Surface Ligand Conc (µmoles / µm^2)
description: **Effective ligand concentration** of the surface pore as felt by a migrating object whose diameter is 1/60th the x-axis length of the scaffold

name: SurfaceAccessibleLigand
label: Surface Accessible Ligand (µmoles)
description: **Cumulative amount of ligand** on particle surfaces that bound the surface pore

name: RegionsVol0
label: Region Vols, <1 um (pL)
description: Volume of the **total void space** within the scaffold

name: RegionsVol10
label: Region Vols, 10 um (pL)
description: Volume of the region of space throughout which a **10 µm spherical object** can migrate without inhibition

name: RegionsVol30
label: Region Vols, 30 um (pL)
description: Volume of the region of space throughout which a **30 µm spherical object** can migrate without inhibition

name: RegionsVol60
label: Region Vols, 60 um (pL)
description: Volume of the region of space throughout which a **60 µm spherical object** can migrate without inhibition
